creator: WhiteBit
descriptionHtml:
WhiteBIT Cryptocurrency Exchange is a crypto trading app that provides security, liquidity and high execution speed to its users. We offer a user-friendly interface with advanced chart tools, fiat trade as well as cryptocurrency trading, competitive fees and an instant multi-language support 24/7. We store all the assets on cold wallets and use the 2FA and KYC to help us to secure your account. Our priority is to keep the app and crypto trade simple for crypto beginners while providing all the necessary functionality for experienced traders. That’s why we are constantly improving our exchange to make your trading with us even better. We are the perfect market if you want to enter the world of finance. Start trading Bitcoin BTC or ETH right now! Enter the world of blockchain! Not connected to Coinbase, CashApp or Ripple. Buy Bitcoin and become a Bitcoin trader with us.

Spend cryptocurrencies with us with the best cryptocurrency prices. We also visit most of the cryptocurrency events to always be in the loop of the latest news.

Digital Assets
At the moment more than 70 currency pairs are available on our exchange. See our wide altcoin selection. Among them are: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Dash (DASH), XLM cryptocurrency and many others. Among our pairs are: BTC USD, EUR USD, UAH RUB and others.

Help & Support
WhiteBIT offers a 24/7 customer support in English, Chinese (Mandarin), Japanese, Russian, Indonesian, Spanish, German, Korean. You can ask anything about the app, our website, the services we offer and user guidelines. If there are any issues or you’re willing to provide a feedback, please contact our customer support team via support@whitebit.com.

title: WhiteBIT App for Trading Crypto

container.value: Sepise tn 1 Lasnamäe linnaosa, Tallinn Harju maakond 11415

creator: WhiteBit
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to WhiteBIT, a centralized cryptocurrency exchange trusted by 300K+ users from 190 countries.

Trade Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, XRP, Litecoin, Cardano, and many other crypto assets. We have some of the most favorable trading and staking conditions in the crypto market.

WhiteBIT suits both beginners and experienced traders. Our platform stands out by its convenience, ease of use, high security, and a wide spectrum of trading opportunities. All the core functions are available on the mobile app:

Trade Bitcoin and other digital assets
On our crypto coin exchange, you can buy Ethereum, Bitcoin, Chainlink, Monero, and other cryptocurrencies. It can be easily done using a credit card. The cryptocurrency wallet allows you to buy Bitcoin, transfer funds quickly and store them securely.

Wide range of cryptocurrencies and trading pairs
Choose from 90+ supported coins offered on 150+ trading pairs. New cryptos are being constantly added.

Exemplary security
The app is integrated with a two-factor authentication technology that additionally protects your account. The cybersecurity score of WhiteBIT is 8.4, which makes it one of the most reliable crypto exchanges in the world.

Great selection of tools
The application has everything for professional trading: track cryptocurrency rates, place various types of Market, Limit, and Conditional orders, as well as analyze the market using charts and indicators.

The convenience of passing KYC
Get verified to increase the level of protection of your funds and account. The procedure is quite straightforward and takes from 1 to 24 hours. You don’t have to pass KYC to make deposits and to withdraw up to 2 BTC.

Currency tracking widget
You can monitor asset prices without opening the application. The widget allows you to keep abreast of the market situation to timely adjust trading strategies and increase profits.

Simplicity and ease of use
The intuitive interface simplifies interaction with the application, making it as convenient as possible for traders at any level of experience. The Touch ID sensor allows you to sign in with one touch.

24/7 customer support
You can contact us for help at any time. We are always ready to provide support in resolving any issues related to our exchange. Customer Support is available in six languages: English, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Estonian, and Spanish.
descriptionShort: Crypto Trading Cryptocurrency Trading Crypto Staking

title: WhiteBIT: Cryptocurrency Trading

container.value: Sepise tn 1 Lasnamäe linnaosa, Tallinn Harju maakond 11415

creator: WhiteBit
descriptionHtml:
"WhiteBIT is a centralized cryptocurrency exchange. Trusted by 500k + users from over 190 countries.

With us, you can trade Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, XRP, Litecoin and other assets. A convenient crypto wallet, profitable conditions for trading and staking, and much more are waiting for you.

WhiteBIT is suitable for both experienced traders and beginners because we have everything you need to make money on cryptocurrency. This is a convenient trading platform where you can see the current rate of Bitcoin and other coins. Buy and sell cryptocurrency easily and securely with WhiteBIT.

Wallet and exchange app mode

The app has a wallet mode and an exchange mode.
The wallet mode is available only to registered users after authorization. This is your crypto wallet with all available assets.
The exchange mode shows all available rates and order books. We have 150+ coins and 150+ trading pairs. In this mode, you can analyze the market even without authorization.

Trading tools

Cryptocurrency trading is a process that requires attention and knowledge of various tools. In our application, you can use charts to analyze cryptocurrencies, Market, Limit, Conditional orders and other tools. So, you can trade crypto efficiently and profitably.

Secure trading

We protect your funds as much as possible and keep 96% of your assets in cold wallets. The application has a whitelist function where you can enter addresses you trust and withdraw funds only to them. For additional protection during withdrawal, we send you a verification code by email.

AML check

You can check directly in the app if the addresses are involved in money laundering. You will see the risk percentage and the signals from which it is formed. For example, the use of an address on the darknet or gambling business.

Fast authentication

Sign in instantly with Face ID and Touch ID. You can also activate 2FA authentication to make sure no one else gets access to your account.

Automatic logout

Set an automatic logout time to protect your account even more.

Convenient KYC procedure

KYC verification allows you to additionally protect your funds and account. Verification is quite simple and takes a maximum of 24 hours. Without KYC, you can make unlimited deposits and withdraw up to 2 BTC.

Currency rate monitoring widget

Follow your favorite pairs without signing into the application. The widget allows you to always stay up to date in order to timely adjust strategies and increase profits.

Push notifications

Be always aware of changes in deposits and withdrawals, creation and modification of WhiteBIT codes, transfers from the main balance to trading and other changes. You can turn on different types of push notifications in the application settings.

Support service 24/7

Trading on the exchange online can raise some questions, especially if you are a beginner. Contact for help at any time and we will resolve all issues related to the operation of the exchange or your account. Customer support is available in six languages: English, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Estonian, and Spanish."
descriptionShort: Buy and sell crypto such as bitcoin, bitcoin cash, ethereum, litecoin and more.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this update we've added new safety features:

- Added e-mail verification for new devices. If you want to log in from a new device, you'll need to go through additional verification so that we can make sure that it is you. This will prevent anyone else from logging into your account.
- Protected your account from 2FA guessing. If a scammer tries to match a 2FA code to your account, we'll temporarily freeze the account to save your assets. You can unfreeze your account via support or e-mail.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this update we've added new safety features:

- Added e-mail verification for new devices. If you want to log in from a new device, you'll need to go through additional verification so that we can make sure that it is you. This will prevent anyone else from logging into your account.
- Protected your account from 2FA guessing. If a scammer tries to match a 2FA code to your account, we'll temporarily freeze the account to save your assets. You can unfreeze your account via support or e-mail.

title: WhiteBIT – buy & sell bitcoin. Crypto wallet

container.value: Sepise tn 1 Lasnamäe linnaosa, Tallinn Harju maakond 11415

creator: WhiteBit
descriptionHtml:
WhiteBIT is a centralized cryptocurrency exchange. Trusted by 500k + users from over 190 countries.

With us, you can trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE) and other assets. A convenient crypto wallet, profitable conditions for trading and staking, and much more are waiting for you.

WhiteBIT is suitable for both experienced traders and beginners because we have everything you need to make money on cryptocurrency. This is a convenient trading platform where you can see the current rate of Bitcoin and other coins. Buy and sell cryptocurrency easily and securely with WhiteBIT.

Wallet and exchange app mode

The app has a wallet mode and an exchange mode.
The wallet mode is available only to registered users after authorization. This is your crypto wallet with all available assets.
The exchange mode shows all available rates and order books. We have 150+ coins and 150+ trading pairs. In this mode, you can analyze the market even without authorization.

Trading tools

Cryptocurrency trading is a process that requires attention and knowledge of various tools. In our application, you can use charts to analyze cryptocurrencies, Market, Limit, Conditional orders and other tools. So, you can trade crypto efficiently and profitably.

Secure trading

We protect your funds as much as possible and keep 96% of your assets in cold wallets. The application has a whitelist function where you can enter addresses you trust and withdraw funds only to them. For additional protection during withdrawal, we send you a verification code by email.

AML check

You can check directly in the app if the addresses are involved in money laundering. You will see the risk percentage and the signals from which it is formed. For example, the use of an address on the darknet or gambling business.

Fast authentication

Sign in instantly with Face ID and Touch ID. You can also activate 2FA authentication to make sure no one else gets access to your account.

Automatic logout

Set an automatic logout time to protect your account even more.

Convenient KYC procedure

KYC verification allows you to additionally protect your funds and account. Verification is quite simple and takes a maximum of 24 hours. Without KYC, you can make unlimited deposits and withdraw up to 2 BTC.

Currency rate monitoring widget

Follow your favorite pairs without signing into the application. The widget allows you to always stay up to date in order to timely adjust strategies and increase profits.

Push notifications

Be always aware of changes in deposits and withdrawals, creation and modification of WhiteBIT codes, transfers from the main balance to trading and other changes. You can turn on different types of push notifications in the application settings.

Support service 24/7

Trading on the exchange online can raise some questions, especially if you are a beginner. Contact for help at any time and we will resolve all issues related to the operation of the exchange or your account. Customer support is available in six languages: English, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Estonian, and Spanish.

Trading tools

Cryptocurrency trading is a process that requires attention and knowledge of various tools. In our application, you can use charts to analyze cryptocurrencies, Market, Limit, Conditional orders and other tools. So, you can trade crypto efficiently and profitably.

Secure trading

creator: WhiteBit
descriptionHtml:
WhiteBIT is a centralized cryptocurrency exchange trusted by over 2 million users from more than 190 countries.

With us, you can trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE), and other assets. A convenient crypto wallet, profitable conditions for trading and staking, margin trading, WhiteBIT Codes, Trading competitions, and much more is waiting for you.

WhiteBIT is suitable for both experienced traders and beginners. This is a convenient trading platform where you can see the current rate of Bitcoin and other coins. Buy and sell cryptocurrency easily and securely with WhiteBIT.

Wallet and Exchange app modes

The app has a Wallet mode and an Exchange mode.

The Wallet mode is available only to registered users after authorization. This is your crypto wallet with all available assets.

The Exchange mode shows all available rates and an order book. We have 250+ coins and 450+ trading pairs. In this mode, you can analyze the market even without authorization.

Trading tools

Cryptocurrency trading is a process that requires attention and knowledge of various tools. In our application, you can find charts to analyze cryptocurrencies, place Market, Limit, and Conditional orders, and use various tools. So, you can trade crypto efficiently and profitably.

Secure trading

We keep 96% of your assets on cold wallets. The app has a whitelist function where you can enter addresses you trust and withdraw funds only to them. For additional protection during withdrawals, we send you a verification code by e-mail.

AML check

You can check directly in the app if the addresses are involved in money laundering. You will see the risk percentage and the signals from which it is formed. For example, the use of an address on the darknet or gambling business.

Fast authentication

Sign in instantly with Face ID and Touch ID. You can also activate 2FA to make sure no one else gets access to your account.

Automatic logout

Set an automatic logout time to protect your account even more.

Convenient KYC procedure

KYC verification allows you to additionally protect your funds and account. Verification is quite simple and takes a maximum of 24 hours. Without KYC, you can make unlimited deposits and withdraw crypto of up to 2 BTC (in equivalent).

Currency rate monitoring widget

Follow your favorite pairs without signing into the application. The widget allows you to always stay up to date in order to timely adjust strategies and increase profits.

Push notifications

Be always aware of changes in deposits and withdrawals, creation and modification of WhiteBIT Codes, and other changes. You can turn on different types of push notifications in the application settings.

Margin trading

We aspire to give our users a possibility to trade crypto with leverage, hence, reach considerably higher trading results. On our exchange platform, you can trade with up to 5x leverage, multiplying the potential income by many times. Now, Margin trading is available on the iOS app as well as on the Android crypto app.

WhiteBIT Codes

Welcome a unique tool of the exchange, which allows transferring fiat and crypto to other users of the exchange fee-free and use the funds on the Bitcoin Global P2P platform. The feature is available on the iOS app and on the Android crypto application.

Trading competition

On regular exchanges, you can simply buy and sell currency online. Our exchange platform offers a wide range of activities, enabling users to enjoy additional income in a fun and entertaining way. The users with the biggest trading volumes on a specific pair get to win rewards in crypto.

Support service 24/7

Contact us at any time, and we will resolve all issues related to the operation of the exchange or your account. Customer support is available in eight languages: English, Russian, Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Ukrainian, Estonian, and Spanish.

creator: WhiteBit
descriptionHtml:
WhiteBIT centralized cryptocurrency exchange



Our exchange offers a reliable Bitcoin wallet, favorable conditions for crypto investing and trading, assets holding, convenient monitoring of the crypto rates, margin and futures trading, as well as unique tools designed by our professionals.

WhiteBIT is suitable for both experienced traders and beginners because we have everything you need to buy and trade cryptocurrencies. In our crypto app, you can find Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE), and many other assets in 450+ trading pairs.

We are trusted by over 3 million users from over 190 countries.

Wallet and Exchange app modes



The app has a Wallet mode and an Exchange mode.

The Wallet mode is available only to registered users. It is your crypto wallet with all available assets. You can also connect it with your Mercuryo Bitcoin crypto wallet.

The Exchange mode shows all available rates and an order book. We have 250+ cryptocurrencies in 450+ trading pairs. In this mode, you can analyze the market cap and other values even without authorization.

Trading tools



In our application, you can find charts to analyze the crypto market, place Market, Limit, and Conditional orders, and use other tools for cryptocurrency trading. So, you can trade crypto efficiently and profitably.

Secure trading



Safety and security of trading on the exchange are ensured by:

keeping 96% of assets on cold wallets;
whitelist function with addresses you trust;
sending a verification code via e-mail during withdrawals;
AML checks of crypto addresses;
Face ID, Touch ID, and 2FA authentication;
automatic logout;
the convenient and fast procedure of identity verification that takes no more than 24 hours.

Unverified users can make unlimited deposits and withdraw up to 2 BTC (in equivalent).

Widgets and push notifications



Use the widget and follow the cryptocurrency rates without signing in to the Bitcoin trading app. You can also set up push notifications and stay aware of all changes regarding deposits, withdrawals, transfers, etc.

Margin trading



Trade crypto with leverage and reach considerably higher trading results. In our crypto exchange app, you can trade with up to 20x leverage, multiplying the potential income by many times. Now, margin trading is available on the iOS app as well as on the Android crypto app.

Futures trading



We are one of the few exchanges that offer cryptocurrency futures trading, namely Bitcoin perpetual futures.


WhiteBIT Codes



We strive to ensure that not only trade, but also the use of our service in general is simple, reliable, and convenient. WhiteBIT Codes allow transferring national currencies and crypto to other users of the exchange fee-free and using the funds on the Bitcoin Global P2P platform.

Trading competition



Our exchange platform offers a wide range of activities in partnership with blockchain projects, enabling users to win rewards by making the largest trading volume on a specific pair.

SMART Staking



Why just buy Bitcoin and hold it when you can both hold and earn interest? Passive income with SMART Staking can bring you up to 30% profit, depending on the duration of the chosen plan.

Invite friends



Participate in the affiliate program of our cryptocurrency exchange and earn passively. Members receive 40% of trading fees paid by users invited to the exchange via the referral link.

History



Users can view the history of all their transactions using a set of convenient filters.

Support service 24/7



Got any questions like “how to buy crypto” or “how to use a BTC wallet”? You can contact our multilingual support team 24/7, and we will resolve all issues related to the operation of the exchange or your account.

creator: WhiteBit
descriptionHtml:
WhiteBIT is a centralized cryptocurrency exchange trusted by over 2 million users from more than 190 countries.

With us, you can trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE), and other assets. A convenient crypto wallet, profitable conditions for trading and staking, margin trading, WhiteBIT Codes, Trading competitions, and much more is waiting for you.

WhiteBIT is suitable for both experienced traders and beginners. This is a convenient trading platform where you can see the current rate of Bitcoin and other coins. Buy and sell cryptocurrency easily and securely with WhiteBIT.

Wallet and Exchange app modes

The app has a Wallet mode and an Exchange mode.

The Wallet mode is available only to registered users after authorization. This is your crypto wallet with all available assets.

The Exchange mode shows all available rates and an order book. We have 250+ coins and 450+ trading pairs. In this mode, you can analyze the market even without authorization.

Trading tools

Cryptocurrency trading is a process that requires attention and knowledge of various tools. In our application, you can find charts to analyze cryptocurrencies, place Market, Limit, and Conditional orders, and use various tools. So, you can trade crypto efficiently and profitably.

Secure trading

We keep 96% of your assets on cold wallets. The app has a whitelist function where you can enter addresses you trust and withdraw funds only to them. For additional protection during withdrawals, we send you a verification code by e-mail.

AML check

You can check directly in the app if the addresses are involved in money laundering. You will see the risk percentage and the signals from which it is formed. For example, the use of an address on the darknet or gambling business.

Fast authentication

Sign in instantly with Face ID and Touch ID. You can also activate 2FA to make sure no one else gets access to your account.

Automatic logout

Set an automatic logout time to protect your account even more.

Convenient KYC procedure

KYC verification allows you to additionally protect your funds and account. Verification is quite simple and takes a maximum of 24 hours. Without KYC, you can make unlimited deposits and withdraw crypto of up to 2 BTC (in equivalent).

Currency rate monitoring widget

Follow your favorite pairs without signing into the application. The widget allows you to always stay up to date in order to timely adjust strategies and increase profits.

Push notifications

Be always aware of changes in deposits and withdrawals, creation and modification of WhiteBIT Codes, and other changes. You can turn on different types of push notifications in the application settings.

Margin trading

We aspire to give our users a possibility to trade crypto with leverage, hence, reach considerably higher trading results. On our exchange platform, you can trade with up to 5x leverage, multiplying the potential income by many times. Now, Margin trading is available on the iOS app as well as on the Android crypto app.

WhiteBIT Codes

Welcome a unique tool of the exchange, which allows transferring fiat and crypto to other users of the exchange fee-free and use the funds on the Bitcoin Global P2P platform. The feature is available on the iOS app and on the Android crypto application.

Trading competition

On regular exchanges, you can simply buy and sell currency online. Our exchange platform offers a wide range of activities, enabling users to enjoy additional income in a fun and entertaining way. The users with the biggest trading volumes on a specific pair get to win rewards in crypto.

Support service 24/7

Contact us at any time, and we will resolve all issues related to the operation of the exchange or your account. Customer support is available in eight languages: English, Russian, Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Ukrainian, Estonian, and Spanish.

Support Wear OS

title: WhiteBIT – buy & sell bitcoin

creator: WhiteBit
descriptionHtml:
WhiteBIT is a centralized cryptocurrency exchange trusted by over 4 million users from more than 190 countries.

With us, you can trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE), and other assets. A convenient crypto wallet, profitable conditions for trading and staking, margin trading, WhiteBIT Codes, Trading competitions, and much more is waiting for you.

WhiteBIT is suitable for both experienced traders and beginners. This is a convenient trading platform where you can see the current rate of Bitcoin and other coins. Buy and sell cryptocurrency easily and securely with WhiteBIT.

Wallet and Exchange app modes

The app has a Wallet mode and an Exchange mode.

The Wallet mode is available only to registered users after authorization. This is your crypto wallet with all available assets.

The Exchange mode shows all available rates and an order book. We have 250+ coins and 450+ trading pairs. In this mode, you can analyze the market even without authorization.

Trading tools

Cryptocurrency trading is a process that requires attention and knowledge of various tools. In our application, you can find charts to analyze cryptocurrencies, place Market, Limit, and Conditional orders, and use various tools. So, you can trade crypto efficiently and profitably.

Secure trading

We keep 96% of your assets on cold wallets. The app has a whitelist function where you can enter addresses you trust and withdraw funds only to them. For additional protection during withdrawals, we send you a verification code by e-mail.

AML check

You can check directly in the app if the addresses are involved in money laundering. You will see the risk percentage and the signals from which it is formed. For example, the use of an address on the darknet or gambling business.

Fast authentication

Sign in instantly with Face ID and Touch ID. You can also activate 2FA to make sure no one else gets access to your account.

Automatic logout

Set an automatic logout time to protect your account even more.

Convenient KYC procedure

KYC verification allows you to additionally protect your funds and account. Verification is quite simple and takes a maximum of 24 hours.

Currency rate monitoring widget

Follow your favorite pairs without signing into the application. The widget allows you to always stay up to date in order to timely adjust strategies and increase profits.

Push notifications

Be always aware of changes in deposits and withdrawals, creation and modification of WhiteBIT Codes, and other changes. You can turn on different types of push notifications in the application settings.

Margin trading

We aspire to give our users a possibility to trade crypto with leverage, hence, reach considerably higher trading results. On our exchange platform, you can trade with up to 5x leverage, multiplying the potential income by many times. Now, Margin trading is available on the iOS app as well as on the Android crypto app.

WhiteBIT Codes

Welcome a unique tool of the exchange, which allows transferring fiat and crypto to other users of the exchange fee-free and use the funds on the Bitcoin Global P2P platform. The feature is available on the iOS app and on the Android crypto application.

Trading competition

On regular exchanges, you can simply buy and sell currency online. Our exchange platform offers a wide range of activities, enabling users to enjoy additional income in a fun and entertaining way. The users with the biggest trading volumes on a specific pair get to win rewards in crypto.

Support service 24/7

Contact us at any time, and we will resolve all issues related to the operation of the exchange or your account. Customer support is available in eight languages: English, Russian, Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Ukrainian, Estonian, and Spanish.

Support Wear OS

Our exchange offers a reliable Bitcoin wallet, favorable conditions for crypto investing and trading, assets holding, convenient monitoring of the crypto rates, margin and futures trading, as well as unique tools designed by our professionals.

WhiteBIT is suitable for both experienced traders and beginners because we have everything you need to buy and trade cryptocurrencies. In our crypto app, you can find Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE), and many other assets in 450+ trading pairs.

We are trusted by over 4 million users from over 190 countries.

Wallet and Exchange app modes



The app has a Wallet mode and an Exchange mode.

The Wallet mode is available only to registered users. It is your crypto wallet with all available assets. You can also connect it with your Mercuryo Bitcoin crypto wallet.

The Exchange mode shows all available rates and an order book. We have 250+ cryptocurrencies in 450+ trading pairs. In this mode, you can analyze the market cap and other values even without authorization.

Trading tools



In our application, you can find charts to analyze the crypto market, place Market, Limit, and Conditional orders, and use other tools for cryptocurrency trading. So, you can trade crypto efficiently and profitably.

Secure trading



Safety and security of trading on the exchange are ensured by:

keeping 96% of assets on cold wallets;
whitelist function with addresses you trust;
sending a verification code via e-mail during withdrawals;
AML checks of crypto addresses;
Face ID, Touch ID, and 2FA authentication;
automatic logout;
the convenient and fast procedure of identity verification that takes no more than 24 hours.

Widgets and push notifications



Use the widget and follow the cryptocurrency rates without signing in to the Bitcoin trading app. You can also set up push notifications and stay aware of all changes regarding deposits, withdrawals, transfers, etc.

Margin trading



Trade crypto with leverage and reach considerably higher trading results. In our crypto exchange app, you can trade with up to 20x leverage, multiplying the potential income by many times. Now, margin trading is available on the iOS app as well as on the Android crypto app.

Futures trading



We are one of the few exchanges that offer cryptocurrency futures trading, namely Bitcoin perpetual futures.


WhiteBIT Codes



We strive to ensure that not only trade, but also the use of our service in general is simple, reliable, and convenient. WhiteBIT Codes allow transferring national currencies and crypto to other users of the exchange fee-free and using the funds on the Bitcoin Global P2P platform.

Trading competition



Our exchange platform offers a wide range of activities in partnership with blockchain projects, enabling users to win rewards by making the largest trading volume on a specific pair.

Crypto Lending



Why just buy Bitcoin and hold it when you can loan it to the exchange and earn interest? Passive income with Crypto Lending can bring you up to 24.85% profit, depending on the duration of the chosen plan.

Invite friends



Participate in the affiliate program of our cryptocurrency exchange and earn passively. Members receive 40% of trading fees paid by users invited to the exchange via the referral link.

History



Users can view the history of all their transactions using a set of convenient filters.

Support service 24/7



Got any questions like “how to buy crypto” or “how to use a BTC wallet”? You can contact our multilingual support team 24/7, and we will resolve all issues related to the operation of the exchange or your account.

Support Wear OS
descriptionShort: Cryptocurrency wallet, crypto trading, investing and exchange. Tether, USDT.

title:

creator: WhiteBit
descriptionHtml:
WhiteBIT centralized cryptocurrency exchange



Our exchange offers a reliable Bitcoin wallet, favorable conditions for crypto investing and trading, assets holding, convenient monitoring of the crypto rates, margin and futures trading, as well as unique tools designed by our professionals.

WhiteBIT is suitable for both experienced traders and beginners because we have everything you need to buy and trade cryptocurrencies. In our crypto app, you can find Bitcoin (BTC), Tether (USDT), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE), and many other assets in 450+ trading pairs.

We are trusted by over 4 million users from over 190 countries.

Wallet and Exchange app modes



The app has a Wallet mode and an Exchange mode.

The Wallet mode is available only to registered users. It is your crypto wallet with all available assets. You can also connect it with your Mercuryo Bitcoin crypto wallet.

The Exchange mode shows all available rates and an order book. We have 250+ cryptocurrencies in 450+ trading pairs. In this mode, you can analyze the market cap and other values even without authorization.

Trading tools



In our application, you can find charts to analyze the crypto market, place Market, Limit, and Conditional orders, and use other tools for cryptocurrency trading. So, you can trade crypto efficiently and profitably.

Secure trading



Safety and security of trading on the exchange are ensured by:

keeping 96% of assets on cold wallets;
whitelist function with addresses you trust;
sending a verification code via e-mail during withdrawals;
AML checks of crypto addresses;
Face ID, Touch ID, and 2FA authentication;
automatic logout;
the convenient and fast procedure of identity verification that takes no more than 24 hours.

Widgets and push notifications



Use the widget and follow the cryptocurrency rates without signing in to the Bitcoin trading app. You can also set up push notifications and stay aware of all changes regarding deposits, withdrawals, transfers, etc.

Margin trading



Trade crypto with leverage and reach considerably higher trading results. In our crypto exchange app, you can trade with up to 20x leverage, multiplying the potential income by many times. Now, margin trading is available on the iOS app as well as on the Android crypto app.

Futures trading



We are one of the few exchanges that offer cryptocurrency futures trading, namely Bitcoin perpetual futures.


WhiteBIT Codes



We strive to ensure that not only trade, but also the use of our service in general is simple, reliable, and convenient. WhiteBIT Codes allow transferring national currencies and crypto to other users of the exchange fee-free and using the funds on the Bitcoin Global P2P platform.

Trading competition



Our exchange platform offers a wide range of activities in partnership with blockchain projects, enabling users to win rewards by making the largest trading volume on a specific pair.

Crypto Lending



Why just buy Bitcoin and hold it when you can loan it to the exchange and earn interest? Passive income with Crypto Lending can bring you up to 24.85% profit, depending on the duration of the chosen plan.

Invite friends



Participate in the affiliate program of our cryptocurrency exchange and earn passively. Members receive 40% of trading fees paid by users invited to the exchange via the referral link.

History



Users can view the history of all their transactions using a set of convenient filters.

Support service 24/7



Got any questions like “how to buy crypto” or “how to use a BTC wallet”? You can contact our multilingual support team 24/7, and we will resolve all issues related to the operation of the exchange or your account.

Support Wear OS

Secure trading



Safety and security of trading on the exchange are ensured by:

keeping 96% of assets on cold wallets;
whitelist function with addresses you trust;
sending a verification code via e-mail during withdrawals;
AML checks of crypto addresses;
Face ID, Touch ID, and 2FA authentication;
automatic logout;
the convenient and fast procedure of identity verification that takes no more than 24 hours.

Widgets and push notifications



Use the widget and follow the cryptocurrency rates without signing in to the Bitcoin trading app. You can also set up push notifications and stay aware of all changes regarding deposits, withdrawals, transfers, etc.

Margin trading



Trade crypto with leverage and reach considerably higher trading results. In our crypto exchange app, you can trade with up to 20x leverage, multiplying the potential income by many times. Now, margin trading is available on the iOS app as well as on the Android crypto app.

Futures trading



We are one of the few exchanges that offer cryptocurrency futures trading, namely Bitcoin perpetual futures.


WhiteBIT Codes



We strive to ensure that not only trade, but also the use of our service in general is simple, reliable, and convenient. WhiteBIT Codes allow transferring national currencies and crypto to other users of the exchange fee-free and using the funds on the Bitcoin Global P2P platform.

Trading competition



Our exchange platform offers a wide range of activities in partnership with blockchain projects, enabling users to win rewards by making the largest trading volume on a specific pair.

Crypto Lending



Why just buy Bitcoin and hold it when you can loan it to the exchange and earn interest? Passive income with Crypto Lending can bring you up to 24.85% profit, depending on the duration of the chosen plan.

Invite friends



Participate in the affiliate program of our cryptocurrency exchange and earn passively. Members receive 40% of trading fees paid by users invited to the exchange via the referral link.

History



Users can view the history of all their transactions using a set of convenient filters.

Support service 24/7



Got any questions like “how to buy crypto” or “how to use a BTC wallet”? You can contact our multilingual support team 24/7, and we will resolve all issues related to the operation of the exchange or your account.

Support Wear OS

title:

creator: WhiteBit
descriptionHtml:
WhiteBIT is the biggest European centralized cryptocurrency exchange per traffic. It is part of the WhiteBIT Group, a blockchain and crypto ecosystem with over 30 million customers. WhiteBIT provides a secure environment for crypto trading, trading with up to 100x leverage, crypto investing, bitcoin wallet, and other unique tools.

WhiteBIT regularly undergoes cybersecurity audits and was the first in the world to receive Level 3 certification of the Cryptocurrency Security Standard (CCSS).

Functionality:

Spot trading. Trade over 550 pairs using the most efficient order types.
Margin Trading. Trading Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies with leverage. In the WhieBIT app, you can trade crypto with up to 10x leverage, multiplying your potential income.
Futures Trading. WhiteBIT is one of the few exchanges that offer cryptocurrency futures trading, namely perpetual Bitcoin futures with up to 100x leverage.
Exchange: Buy crypto with ease via quick coin exchange and access to exchanging fiat to crypto with a 10-second freeze.
WhiteBIT Nova is a debit card that allows you to spend cryptocurrency on everyday purchases with up to 10% of real cashback in BTC or WBT, 0% fee for opening and closing the card, Apple Pay and Google Pay integration, ATM withdrawals, invite bonus, and more. Available in both digital and physical formats.
WhiteBIT Coin (WBT). Native coin of WhiteBIT, which provides discounts on trading fees, increased bonuses under the referral program, free token withdrawals, SoulDrop rewards, and much more.
Analytics dashboard. Monitor the most important indicators in one place — trading volumes, PnL, balance status, WBT Holding and VIP levels, referral statistics, visualization of balance trends, asset portfolio, etc.
Cryptocurrency rate monitoring widget. Monitor the crypto market without logging into the application. The widget will track the cryptocurrency rate and show it on your Apple Watch or iPhone.
Auto-invest. Buy Bitcoin and other cryptos automatically according to your parameters. Simply set up a plan for the selected cryptocurrency and specify the amount and frequency of purchase for efficient crypto investing.
QuickSend and WhiteBIT codes. Two ways to instantly send funds to other users within the exchange with a 0% fee.
Crypto Lending. Get up to 18.64% profit, depending on the asset and the duration of the selected plan. Invest in Bitcoin or altcoins alike.
Referral program. Receive up to 50% of trading fees paid by users invited to the exchange via your referral link.
Affiliate program offers unique opportunities for influencers, projects and platforms with a wide audience interested in cryptocurrency and blockchain. Program participants can receive up to 60% of the affiliate bonus — trading fees of referred users.
24/7 support. Our team can respond in Ukrainian, Georgian, Spanish, English, Turkish, German, Polish, and Portuguese.
